product_name: CamelBak Arc Quick Grip Water Bottle
long_description: The CamelBak Arc Quick Grip water bottle keeps your hydration at hand while on a run, and carries your running essentials in the small attached pocket. Podium Arc bottle is contoured to fit your hand; self-sealing JetValve(TM) cap eliminates drips and lets you sip from any direction or squirt to cool off on a hot day. Breathable strap wraps around hand to keep bottle in place without having to grip it. Small rip-and-stick pocket holds keys, energy gel or ID card.
short_description: The CamelBak Arc Quick Grip water bottle keeps your hydration at hand while on a run, and carries your running essentials in the small attached pocket.
